text: Emilie de Ravin (born 27 December 1981) is an Australian actress, best known for her starring roles as Tess Harding in the sci-fi series Roswell (2000–2002), Claire Littleton in the ABC drama series Lost (2004–2008, 2010), and Belle in the American Broadcasting Company fantasy-drama series Once Upon a Time (2011–2018). Ravin was born in Mount Eliza, Victoria, Australia. ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Australian television actors Category:Australian movie actors Category:Actors from Victoria (Australia)
title: Emilie de Ravin
